My family and I experienced the service for the first time at Vinpearl Nha Trang Bay. I booked a 2-bedroom villa facing the lake with full amenities and a beautiful view. Delicious food and friendly staff. If I have a chance, I will come back with my family

Beautiful, clean beach. The view over Nha Trang Bay is very beautiful. The rooms are luxuriously designed and fully equipped. Friendly staff and attentive support. The atmosphere is very cool and many activities are suitable for children.

Very clean room, professional receptionist, enthusiastic Housekeeping staff, high-class and 24/7 service. Vinmec provides full and quality support. Vinpearl Nha Trang Bay deserves to be the luxury resort choice for families and relatives when coming to Nha Trang.

I went with my family and friends to stay at villa 6326, a total of 18 people. Stay 3 days 2 nights. The buffet food is quite delicious, appetizing and quite diverse. Staff pay attention to politeness. I have stayed at Vinpearl many times and feel very satisfied. And will come back.

Good service, the waiters are very enthusiastic and attentive and the children are very polite. Delicious food and beautiful hotel scenery. We stayed here for 2 nights and also experienced many of the hotel's services. Everything is good. If there is a chance, I will come back here

JbGkU: Gd's experience was very satisfying and will definitely come back next time
orRIx: All very good. Staff and service are very satisfied. Comfortable room. The warm water swimming pool is very popular for children to bathe in. Clean beach. The play area has many family games that are very suitable for children to participate in. Delicious food at reasonable prices

My first feeling when I came here was your enthusiastic welcome. Dedicated guidance on check-in procedures and luggage storage. Especially friends Anh Tri, Hien, Uyen on the mainland. If I have a chance, I will come back next time

When I first came to Vinpearl Nha Trang, I was very impressed with the staff here. Very friendly and enthusiastic. In particular, Tri Bellman, Hien, and Nhat Vy welcomed the guides of the amusement park very warmly. The receptionist Que and Only explained in great detail. Thank you all very much

The family had a wonderful vacation in Nha Trang Bay, the first impression was the beautiful landscape, diverse games, delicious eye-catching food, the second impression was the enthusiastic welcoming staff, especially Ms. My Le at port 2

We had a fun 5-day vacation at Vinpearl Resort & Spa Nha Trang Bay. The deserted beach with fine white sand and clear blue water is truly beautiful. When checking in at the pier, I was very impressed with the very modern customer recognition equipment here, and the enthusiastic support staff taking us to the island. Spacious room with 2 balconies with beautiful sea views.The buffet has a rich menu, many options but few Vietnamese dishes. The dinner buffet adds seafood, grilled fish, and cold shrimp and squid, so the deliciousness is reduced by half.Lagu restaurant on the beach has a nice open seating space but the food is not delicious and is full of western food.Hotel staff are mostly friendly to customers, but there are a few cases where they should be retrained a bitFor example, on the first day, my mother and 3 children came down for dinner (my husband arrived 1 day late). It was calculated as 2 adults and 1 11 year old child, but the buffet ticket seller kept saying that my child was 12 years old and had to buy an adult meal. , while the identification system provides life information for adults and children. Then I provided the child's birth date and was not yet 12 years old, so I accepted to sell children's tickets.And another case is when we left from Vinwonder around 5:00 p.m., we went to the station to wait for the tram to take us to the resort. We saw the staff calling the car there so we asked if there was a bus back to the hotel. They asked which area it was in. The answer was resort & spa and the person showed an impatient attitude and turned away and said, Show me your room card, how can you know where you are when you say that :D I thought I heard wrong Because of this attitude, you cannot be an employee of a 5-star resort.

The hotel room is good, the room is large and clean, the glass is very clean, the room is fully equipped with necessary appliances, more than what you think, there are still a few staff who are superficial with guests but overall it's still good, will visit again. again

JbGkU: A memorable vacation at Vinpearl Resort and Nha Trang Bay hamlet

I have traveled to many places, experienced many types of tourism, so I found everything in Nha Trang Bay to be very good. I chose a Villa to stay with my family, with a swimming pool for children. The children also liked the area very much. Have fun playing Vinwonders too.
